actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-741, by Mr. Dreier.

The resolution makes in order a motion offered by the chair of the Committee on Ways and Means or his designee that the House concur in the Senate amendments to H.R. 8. The resolution waives all points of order against consideration of the motion and the Senate amendments and provides that they shall be considered as read.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 176.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 844.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 408 - 10 (Roll no. 658).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the Senate amendments to the bill (H.R. 8) to extend certain tax relief provisions enacted in 2001 and 2003, and to provide for expedited consideration of a bill providing for comprehensive tax reform, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the Senate amendments to the bill (H.R. 8) to extend certain tax relief provisions enacted in 2001 and 2003 and to provide for expedited consideration of a bill providing for comprehensive tax reform.

titles.title: Providing for consideration of the Senate amendments to the bill (H.R. 8) to extend certain tax relief provisions enacted in 2001 and 2003, and to provide for expedited consideration of a bill providing for comprehensive tax reform, and for other purposes.
